messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
Ask Fredrik Thordendal How's the new album coming along.
Sure— I can send him a message. Could you please provide Fredrik Thordendal’s phone number so I can ask, “How’s the new album coming along?”?
I don't have his phone number.
No problem. Do you have any other way to contact Fredrik—such as an email address or social-media handle—or would you like me to help locate his management or official contact info?
I don't have any other contact info either.

Since you don’t have any direct contact info, here are a few ways you could get in touch with Fredrik Thordendal or his team:

1. Official Website or Band Site  
   • Check Meshuggah’s official website (meshuggah.se) or Fredrik’s personal site (if he has one). Often there’s a “Contact” or “Press” section with email addresses for management or publicity.

2. Record Label / Publisher  
   • Meshuggah is signed to Nuclear Blast (nuclearblast.com). Visit their site’s “Contact” or “Press” page and ask to be connected with Fredrik’s management.

3. Social Media  
   • Look for verified accounts on Instagram, Facebook, or Twitter. You can send a direct message or find a link to his official booking/management contacts in his profile.

4. Booking Agent / Management  
   • Many artists list their booking agent on sites like Bandsintown or Songkick. You can search for Meshuggah or Fredrik Thordendal and then request the agent’s email.

5. Publicist or Press Kit  
   • Press kits often include a contact email. Try googling “Fredrik Thordendal press kit” or check music-industry databases like AllMusic or Discogs for management details.

Would you like more guidance on any of these steps?
Those are some good tips, thanks. I'll try checking those out.
You’re welcome! Good luck tracking down the right contact. If you need help with anything else—researching specific management contacts, drafting a message, or anything—just let me know.
